S03n229:2: kena nāma manuṣyabhūtena na dātavyaṃ syāt ?
S03n229:4: kasmiṃścidaraṇyāyatanapradeśe manojñavīruttṛṇatarugahananicite puṣpaphalavati vaiḍūryanīlaśucivāhinyā saritā vibhūṣitaparyante mṛduśādvalāstaraṇasukhasaṃsparśadarśanīyadharaṇītale tapasvijanavicarite bodhisattvaḥ śaśo babhūva |
S03n229:11: tasya guṇātiśayasaṃbhṛtena snehagauraveṇa viśeṣavattaramavabaddhahṛdayāstu ye sahāyā babhūvurudraḥ śṛgālo vānaraśca,
S03n229:12: te parasparasaṃbandhanibaddhasnehā iva bāndhavā anyonyapraṇayasaṃmānanāvirūḍhasauhārdā iva ca suhṛdaḥ saṃmodamānāstatra viharanti sma |
S03n229:13: tiryaksvabhāvavimukhāśca prāṇiṣu dayānuvṛttyā laulyapraśamādvismṛtasteyapravṛttyā dharmāvirodhinyā ca yaśo'nuvṛttyā paṭuvijñānatvādviniyamadhīrayā ca sajjaneṣṭayā ceṣṭayā devatānāmapi vismayanīyā babhūvuḥ |
S03n229:14: sukhānulome guṇabādhini krame guṇānukūle ca sukhoparodhini |
S03n229:16: abhūtsa teṣāṃ tu śaśākṛtiḥ kṛtī parānukampāpratiṣadgururguruḥ |
S03n229:18: atha kadācit sa mahātmā sāyāhnasamaye dharmaśravaṇārthamabhigataiḥ sabahumānamupāsyamānastaiḥ sahāyaiḥ paripūrṇaprāyamaṃḍalamādityaviprakarṣādvyavadāyamānaśobhaṃ rūpyadarpaṇamiva tsaruvirahitamīṣatpārśvāpavṛttabimbaṃ śuklapakṣacaturdaśīcandramasamuditamabhisamīkṣya sahāyānuvāca-
S03n229:26: dānena śīlābharaṇena tasmāt puṇyāni saṃvardhayituṃ yatadhvam |
S03n229:27: vivartamānasya hi janmadurge lokasya puṇyāni parā pratiṣṭhā ||8 ||
S03n229:36: te tathetyasyānuśāsanāṃ pratigṛhyābhivādya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya cainaṃ svānsvānālayānabhijagmuḥ |
S03n229:37: aciragateṣu ca teṣu sahāyeṣu sa mahātmā cintāmāpede |
S03n229:44: tatkutredānīmidamatithiparicaryāvaiguṇye niḥsāraṃ śarīrakamutsṛjyamānaṃ kasyacidupayogāya syāditi vimṛśansa mahātmā smṛtiṃ pratilebhe |
S03n229:49: samadhigatamidaṃ mayātitheyaṃ hṛdaya vimuñca yato viṣādadainyam |
S03n229:51: iti viniścatya sa mahāsattvaḥ paramamiva lābhamadhigamya paramaprītamanāstatrāvatastheḥ |
S03n229:54: tataḥ praharṣādiva sācalā calā mahī babhūvānibhṛtārṇavāṃśukā |
S03n229:60: tadupalabhya pramuditavismitamanobhirdevatābhiḥ samantataḥ parikīrtyamānaṃ tasya vitarkādbhūtaṃ śakro devendraḥ samāpūryamāṇavismayakautūhalena manasā tasya mahāsattvasya bhāvajijñāsayā dvitīye'hani gaganatalamadhyamabhilaṅghamāne paṭutarakiraṇaprabhāve savitari prasphulitamarīcijālavasanāsu bhāsvarātapavisarāvaguṇṭhitāsvanālokanakṣamāsu dikṣu saṃkṣipyamāṇacchāyeṣvabhivṛddhacīrīvirāvonnāditeṣu vanāntareṣu vicchidyamānapakṣisaṃpāteṣu dharmaklamāpītotsāheṣvadhvageṣu śakro devānāmadhipatirbrāhmaṇarūpo bhūtvā mārgapranaṣṭa iva kṣuttarṣaśramaviṣādadīnakaṇṭhaḥ sasvaraṃ prarudannātidūre teṣāṃ vicukrośa |
S03n229:64: kāntāre'smindharmatarṣaklamārtaṃ mā bhaiḥ śabdaiḥ ko nu māṃ hlādayeta ||23 ||
S03n229:65: atha te mahāsattvāstasya tena karuṇenākranditaśabdena samākampitahṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramā drutataragatayastaṃ deśamabhijagmuḥ |
S03n229:68: svasya śiṣyagaṇasyeva samīpe vartase hi naḥ ||24 ||
S03n229:73: khedaprasuptā iva sapta matsyā labdhā mayaitānnivaseha bhuktvā ||26 ||
S03n229:75: ekā ca godhā daghibhājanaṃ ca kenāpi saṃtyaktamihādhyagaccham |
S03n229:79: āmrāṇi pakvānyudakaṃ manojñaṃ chāyā ca satsaṃgamasaukhyaśītā |
S03n229:80: ityasti me brahmavidāṃ variṣṭha bhuktvaitadatraiva tavāstu vāsaḥ ||28 ||
S03n229:81: atha śaśaḥ samupasṛtyainamupacārakriyānantaraṃ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇaḥ svena śarīreṇopanimantrayāmāsa-
S03n229:82: na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane vivṛddhasya śaśasya kecana |
S03n229:85: na cāsti dehādadhikaṃ ca me dhanaṃ pratīccha sarvasvamidaṃ yato mama ||30 ||
S03n229:91: atha śakro devānāmindrastasya bhāvamavetya taptatapanīyavarṇaṃ sphuratpratanujvālaṃ vikīryamāṇavisphuliṅgaprakaraṃ nirdhūmamaṅgārarāśimabhinirmame |
S03n229:96: deyaṃ ca ditsāpravaṇaṃ ca cittaṃ bhavadvidhenātithinā ca yogaḥ |
S03n229:99: tataḥ sa taṃ vahnimabhijvalantaṃ nidhiṃ dhanārthī sahasaiva dṛṣṭvā |
S03n229:101: taddṛṣṭvā paramavismayāvarjitamatirdevānāmadhipatiḥ svameva vapurāsthāya divyakusumavarṣapuraḥsarībhirmanaḥśrutisukhābhirvāgbhirabhipūjya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ kamalapalāśalakṣmīsamṛddhābhyāṃ bhāsurāṅgalībhūṣaṇālaṃkṛtābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ svayameva cainaṃ parigṛhya tridaśebhyaḥ saṃdarśayāmāsa |
S03n229:106: jātiḥ kveyaṃ tadvirodhi kva cedaṃ tyāgaudāryaṃ cetasaḥ pāṭavaṃ ca |
S03n229:107: vispaṣṭo'yaṃ puṇyamandādarāṇāṃ pratyādeśo devatānāṃ nṛṇāṃ ca ||35 ||
S03n229:110: atha śakrastatkarmātiśayavikhyāpanārthaṃ lokahitāvekṣī śaśabimbalakṣaṇena vaijayantasya prāsādavarasya sudharmāyāśca devasabhāyāḥ kūṭāgārakarṇike candramaṇḍalaṃ cābhyalaṃcakāra |
S03n229:117: kena nāma manuṣyabhūtena na dātavyaṃ syāt ?
S03n229:118: tathā tiryaggatā api guṇavātsalyāt saṃpūjyante sadbhiriti guṇeṣvādaraḥ kārya ityevamapyunneyam |
